bubbleString: I shall cast judgment upon your soul.|You dare dispute the weighing of your soul!?|The cycle of life and death is neverending.|I...|Now then...
Mhmhm, let us play together...|Don't you want to hold me?|I eat disobedient little children like you!|My belly is nice and warm, you know...|Just let me eat you already!

The challenge... is to prove your strength...|Let's see what you're made of...|Do you wish to behold my power to consume the universe...?|I'm afraid I can show you no mercy...|Come... Let yourself be pulled by the red thread of fate...|You amuse me. Step forward, and I shall fight you with all my might...|I suggest you give up now, unless you are truly prepared...|Do you have a death wish...?|I hope that you will be a worthy opponent...|Let us fight 'til the very end...
None shall enter!|Give me back my head!|Stand down!|Give me your riches.|Foolish mortals.
Won't you die for me?|Whatever...|...|I'm so cramped in here...|What're you looking at...?
